short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows global toggle of Pandora stream

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pandora Control allows user to play/pause or skip songs on Pandora from anywhere on their computer by using hotkeys. It also displays the name of the current song as the title of the Pandora tab.
